name: BetterDesk
0:
”Alexa, ask better desk, how long should I spend on my desk?”
”Alexa launch better desk”
”Alexa ask better desk, give me some exericeses to strengthen my back”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: better desk
des: In today's world sitting is the new smoking. We need to make sure we are healthy and safe while using our desktops. This app includes many aspects about desk safety from fire hazard, phyiscal injuries and even how to combat bacterial buildup on your desk. All the information I provide was reviewed a medical expert before implementing it into the application which makes all the information here reliable.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
